titlepage.publisher: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Student Council Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-23/2/4.961, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred in 1996 September.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The papers consist of topical files including those issues addressed by the Student Council on Women's Concerns and Gay and Lesbian Concerns.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: Topical Files, 1972-1995
Series II: Women's Concerns, 1972-1994
Series III: Gay and Lesbian Concerns, 1972-1993
Series IV: Restricted Materials, 1978-1995
